title: SMC_GetMaxSetAccDec (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_GetMaxSetAccDec
This function block may be employed to measure the maximum absolute value of acceleration
(or deceleration) of an axis.  Measuring will be done if
bEnable
is
TRUE
, and will
be reset to 0, if
bEnable
is
FALSE
. With
dwTimeStamp
you can provide
a call counter, which is latched output in
dwTimeAtMax
with a new maximum value.

rows.Name: bEnable
rows.Comment: TRUE: Starts execution of function block.

rows:
Optional time stamp input; can be used to find out when the
maximum has occured.

TRUE: Execution of the function block has not been
finished.
